Room.Name: North Highway
Room.ShortDescription: You are on the King's North Highway, but the south way is blocked.
Room.LongDescription: Huge boulders and large rocks look as though they have been deliberately placed across the Highway. A road crew has pitched a small camp on the west side of the road. Another camp is for several of the King's militia who are here to protect the road crew from bandits and Golgoth, the monster from the ice mountain.
